I am the Director of Facilitation for [FieldFutures](fieldfutures.org), an organization that delivers workshops for groups of field scientists. The workshops are interactive and address the unique concerns of remote fieldwork.

We recently evaluated the efficacy of the workshop through a collaboration with a state agency. Read the manuscript [here](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41598-023-49203-0).
